headline.main: Soviet Gives Bonus of Month's Pay to Seamen Reaching Murmansk With Supplies for War

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, July 1 -- A Soviet gesture to American and British merchant marine and navy men bringing war supplies to Russia was revealed today by Lieut. Comdr. Samuel B. Frankel of Stapleton, Staten Island, N.Y., who is assistant United States naval attache at Murmansk.
abstract: US naval attache Lt Comdr S B Frankel reveals USSR gives bonus of mo's pay to seamen reaching Murmansk; repts large convoy arrived in June after 6-day battle; US casualties
